projects.title: Bloggers - Blog App Powered by Django
projects.description: A full-featured blog web app built with Django. Users can create posts, update their profiles, and use email to reset their password. Files are manged on AWS S3.

projects.title: Handcrafty - Sell & Shop for Handmade Items
projects.description: Handcrafty is a full stack online handcrafts store with real credit card checkout. Users can search, sell, edit, add to cart and buy their favorite items.

projects.title: Athena & Lin's Kitchen
projects.description: My family recipe collection built with Gatsby.js. The recipes were saved in markdown files and pulled through GraphQL query's in Gatsby.

projects.title: ‚ÄúÁôæÁÇºÊàêÈí¢‚Äù Baizi Journal App
projects.description: "Baizi" means "100 letters" in Chinese. This full stack minimalist journal app promps user to write a 100-letter journal everyday - not one letter more, not one letter less.

projects.title: Country Flag Guessing Game
projects.description: An educational game that asks the player to guess which country the displayed country flag corresponds to. The country data are fetched from the REST country API.

projects.title: RGB Color Guessing Game
projects.description: Find the square that has the color of the given RGB value. A game built with vanilla JS with a smooth, modern look.

projects.title: Johannes Vermeer Tribute Page
projects.description: A tribute page to the Dutch painter Johannes Vermeer in the 17th century.
